${ModID}:Ignition.NAME: Ignition
${ModID}:Ignition.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点群体伤害。 NL 生成 1个 ${ModID}:烈焰 充能球。

${ModID}:DualBlade.NAME: Dual Blade
${ModID}:DualBlade.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 激发最右侧充能球两次。

${ModID}:Sphere.NAME: Sphere
${ModID}:Sphere.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 生成 1个 ${ModID}:多变 充能球 。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 生成1个 {0} 充能球。

${ModID}:Winterwisp.NAME: Winterwisp
${ModID}:Winterwisp.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 生成 1个 ${ModID}:极寒 充能球。 NL 若 生成 在空栏位， NL 触发其被动效果。

${ModID}:FrozenMagma.NAME: Frozen Magma
${ModID}:FrozenMagma.DESCRIPTION: 生成 1个 ${ModID}:Polar. NL 生成 1个 Frost. NL 生成 1个 ${ModID}:Blaze. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FrozenMagma.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 生成 1个 ${ModID}:Polar. NL 生成 1个 Frost. NL 生成 1个 ${ModID}:Blaze.

${ModID}:Consolidate.NAME: 凝聚
${ModID}:Consolidate.DESCRIPTION: 失去右侧2个充能球。 NL 获得1点 集中 。
${ModID}:Consolidate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 失去右侧1个充能球。 NL 获得1点 集中 。

${ModID}:FrostConversion.NAME: Frost Conversion
${ModID}:FrostConversion.DESCRIPTION: If you have 3+ unique Orbs, 生成 1个 Frost. NL 生成 1个 Frost.
${ModID}:FrostConversion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have 3+ unique Orbs, 生成 1个 Frost and trigger its passive. NL 生成 1个 Frost.

${ModID}:Fluctuate.NAME: Fluctuate
${ModID}:Fluctuate.DESCRIPTION: 给予 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL If you have 3+ unique Orbs, 给予 !M! more.

${ModID}:VoidEngine.NAME: Void Engine
${ModID}:VoidEngine.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Focus. NL 获得 1 Orb Slot. NL Shuffle a Void into your draw pile.
${ModID}:VoidEngine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Focus. NL 获得 1 Orb Slot. NL Add a Void to your discard pile.

${ModID}:ChaosGenerator.NAME: Chaos Generator
${ModID}:ChaosGenerator.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, 生成 !M! 个 random Orb.
${ModID}:ChaosGenerator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, 生成 !M! 个 random Orbs.
